feed.title: Darshan Crout
feed.subtitle: The personal blog of Darshan Crout.

entry.title: Hello, world!
entry.content:
Welcome to my personal site! This site will be used to discuss things that interest me. While you’re here, get to know me and check out my personal setup!

This site was created using Jekyll with the Minimal Mistakes Theme.
entry.summary: Welcome to my personal site! This site will be used to discuss things that interest me. While you’re here, get to know me and check out my personal setup!
